item.cultivatereg.filthy_manual: I Wanted to Cultivate to Immortality, Yet Somehow Ended Up With Nothing But a Filthy Book From Some Homeless Guy
item.cultivatereg.filthy_manual.tooltip: The pages reek of garbage and piss, but they might just hint at how meridians can open.
The beggar's ravings coalesce in your mind. You can finally see the path of cultivation.
You've already wrung all the insight you can from this filthy tome.
item.cultivatereg.basic_qi_manual.toolti: Every cultivator begins with this manual; even if another tries to change it, your path falls back to the basics.
item.cultivatereg.basic_qi_manual.messag: You begin studying the Basic Qi Gathering Manual.
message.cultivatereg.cultivation.locked: You have not unlocked the path of cultivation yet.
message.cultivatereg.cultivation.no_sens: You must first learn to sense Qi before attempting that.
message.cultivatereg.manual.completed: Your understanding of %s deepens; your Qi flows more smoothly.
screen.cultivatereg.manual.heading: %s Study
screen.cultivatereg.manual.instructions: Read carefully, then begin the comprehension test.
Knowledge hides behind each grimy page.
screen.cultivatereg.manual.page_hint: Use the arrows or A/D keys to turn the pages.
screen.cultivatereg.manual.quiz_prompt: Choose the answer that matches the teachings.
screen.cultivatereg.manual.feedback.corr: Correct. Continue to the next step.
screen.cultivatereg.manual.feedback.inco: Incorrect. Re-read the passage and try again.
screen.cultivatereg.manual.already_maste: You have already mastered this manual.
screen.cultivatereg.manual.final_prompt: Turn to the last page when you are ready to take the comprehension test.
item.cultivatereg.booze.tooltip: A suspicious drink brewed from whatever was lying around.
message.cultivatereg.homeless_man.quest_: Bring me some booze and maybe I'll spill a secret or two...
No booze, no secrets. It's that simple.
Ha! Thanks for the booze. Here, take this the secrets to immortality!
Trash can's all yours now, kid. Try not to choke on the smell.
message.cultivatereg.homeless_man.greeti: Pssst, hey kid, you wanna become an immortal?
message.cultivatereg.trash_can.too_foul: You gag and back awayâ€”the beggar refuses to let you rummage yet.
message.cultivatereg.trash_can.need_filt: You dig around in the trash and something brown seems to be stuck to your hand after.
message.cultivatereg.trash_can.find_manu: You rummage through the trash and pull out a Basic Qi Manual!
message.cultivatereg.trash_can.empty: You rummage through the trash but find nothing except a clinging stench.
message.cultivatereg.stank.cannot_eat: You reek too badly to stomach anything. Wash up in water!
message.cultivatereg.stank.cleansed: The stench washes away, letting you eat again.
